name: mapTemplate(_:shouldUpdateNotificationFor:with:)
desc: Asks the delegate whether the system should display the maneuver with updated travel estimates as a notification when the app is in the background.
declaration:
optional func mapTemplate(_ mapTemplate: CPMapTemplate, 
shouldUpdateNotificationFor maneuver: CPManeuver, 
                     with travelEstimates: CPTravelEstimates) -> Bool
